root.text: TECHxis a Paper Presentation event to show case your ideas on a competitive platform in the form of well intriguing presentation. Its trives to explore the inquisitiveness in the field of Electronics and Communication Engineering by giving young minds their incredulous ideas a definitive direction. “Everytime you present a paper, you learn something new”. It provides you an opportunity to learn in detail about a core subject and develop effective presentation skills. It is a great chance to share knowledge as well as expand your knowledge. Showcase your savvy ideas before our professional critics to make the world know who you are!

text: Li-Fi Technology
Wearable Biosensors
Agricultural Robotics
Block chain in Electronics and Communication
Wi-MAX Technology
Wireless Power Transmission Technology
Humanoids
Automation in Industries
Electronic Control Unit(ECU)
Embedded Technology
Artificial Intelligence in Robotics
Send your abstract (IEEE format in PDF form) to techxpsgkriya@gmail.com
Last date for sending the abstract is 15/02/2019, Shortlisted participants will be intimated within 17/02/2019.
Abstract must contain less than 200 words
The selected abstracts can present their paper to the panel of judges.
Working models and simulation would fetch extra points
The papers will be judged based on objectives, methodology, findings and analysis, conclusion, implication/application/limitation.
Paper must be strictly in IEEE format.
Decision of the judges would be final.
The paper should be brief containing at most 500 words and citing the references is mandatory.
The teams have to submit their Hard copy of the paper on that day of the event.
The teams are requested to bring softcopy of both paper and PPT in pendrive.
The presentation should last a maximum of 8 minutes. This will be followed by a 2 minutes Q & A session.
Participants are requested to bring the Bank account details (Bank Name, Branch, Account holder name, Account number, IFSC Code) for crediting the prize amount
